name: Raiden Legacy - Steam Edition
description: RAIDEN LEGACY is a four-title compilation of the mega-popular RAIDEN arcade series including RAIDEN, RAIDEN FIGHTERS, RAIDEN FIGHTERS 2 & RAIDEN FIGHTERS JET.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 2.4Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: -The games run too fast -Buggy multiplayer -Bad emulation -Sound bugs -The first Raiden Fighters game is the old version (Raiden MK-II and Judge Spear missing)  +Original and cool interface  I have never been so disapointed in a Raiden game... DotEmu should have let MOSS or Seibu Kaihatsu program it (and not just license it). Because Seibu did The Raiden Project, and they did amazing on that compilation. So for f*** sake's, let them program it! Or at least make MOSS program it.  Stick to the mobile version. It's much more superior. Or better yet, stick to MAME.
Awesome! No bugs, the game runs perfectly. Fans of these game type will be delighted. I recommend. Thanks DotEmu! :D
